text: “You will keep this practice forever as a statute for yourselves and your descendants.
Do not eat of the blood, therefore, but pour it out on the ground like water.
and the king of Tirzah, one—thirty-one kings in all.
But you must fear the LORD and serve him faithfully with all your heart, for you have seen the great things the LORD has done among you.
Then David consoled Bathsheba his wife. He went and slept with her; and she conceived and bore him a son, who was named Solomon. The LORD loved him

Thus says the LORD: You must not go out to war against your fellow Israelites. Return home, each of you, for it is I who have brought this about. They obeyed the word of the LORD and turned back, according to the word of the LORD.
The Assembly at Hebron. This is the muster of the detachments of armed troops that came to David at Hebron to bring Saul’s kingdom over to him, as the LORD had ordained.

The heads of the Levites were Hashabiah, Sherebiah, Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel. Their kinsmen who stood opposite them to sing praises and thanksgiving in fulfillment of the command of David, the man of God, one section opposite the other,
More Campaigns of Jonathan and Simon. Then Jonathan heard that the officers of Demetrius had returned to attack him with a stronger army than before.

Timothy himself fell into the hands of those under Dositheus and Sosipater; but with great cunning, he begged them to spare his life and let him go, because he had in his power the parents and relatives of many of them, and would show them no consideration.
He takes understanding from the leaders of the land, makes them wander in a pathless desert.
The diligent hand will govern, but sloth makes for forced labor.
No longer shall there be any false visions or deceitful divinations within the house of Israel,
But when the Pharisees heard this, they said, “This man drives out demons only by the power of Beelzebul, the prince of demons.”
Jesus said to them, “Are you not misled because you do not know the scriptures or the power of God?
Notice the ravens: they do not sow or reap; they have neither storehouse nor barn, yet God feeds them. How much more important are you than birds!
Amen, amen, I say to you, unless a grain of wheat falls to the ground and dies, it remains just a grain of wheat; but if it dies, it produces much fruit.
But the word of God continued to spread and grow.
whereas our more presentable parts do not need this. But God has so constructed the body as to give greater honor to a part that is without it,
and Jesus, the mediator of a new covenant, and the sprinkled blood that speaks more eloquently than that of Abel.
